p: The Gram + bacteria S. aureus, S. faecalis and B. Subtilis was inhibited by Citronellal at a minimum concentration of 31.25 μl/ml, 62.5 μl/ml and 125 μl/ml respectively. Among Gram - bacteria, drug sensitive E. coli, drug resistant E. coli HB101, S. typhimurium, P. vulgaris and P. aeruginosa were inhibited ( Table 4).
